GeneDef.label: archivator
GeneDef.description: Carriers of this gene have archites that are capable of rewriting the carrier with an exact copy of it, and then restoring it back if necessary.

customEffectDescriptions.li: Allows you to create a duplicate of the owner, which will take his place in the same second.
Genes, relationships, clothes and everything else are separate for duplicates.
When the gene owner dies or the gene is deleted, all stored duplicates are deleted.
